This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 9, 10, 11 and 12

- Added A12 devices support - Fixed compatibility issues with Harbor
- Fixed a shadow glitch
- Fixed an issue with Appcon - Fixed an issue where resized and rotated icons would return to their default size when launching an app
- Fixed an issue where resized and rotated icons would return to their default size when aborting an app launch
- Icon images in the App Switcher, Notification Center, Lockscreen, Spotlight search and Banners will now also be customized
- It is now possible to manually input value for slider in the app preferences by doing a long press on the desired slider
- Fixed compatibility issues with other tweaks
- Fixed a small issue

- Fixed an issue that might have caused an crash on iOS9

- Added full iOS10.2 support,
- Fixed some small bug in preferences
- Fixed a conflict with Manila tweak which may have caused a crash.

- Fixed a small crash that could occasionally happen on respring

- Fixed an issue where the calendar icon would not update when the date changes
- Fixed some small bugs that might have caused crashes
- Improved preferences
- Fixed a compatibility issue with FolderEnhancer where the folder icon border would not match the folder icon when the corner radius was specified in FolderEnhancer

- Shadows can now be added to the icon
- Added new variations for automatic color (only dark colors, only bright colors)
- It is now possible to add border to folder icons
- Webclips (website bookmarks on springboard) can now also be customized
- It is now possible to hide or colorize the folder icon blur background
- It is now possible to hide or colorize the folder blur background when a folder is open
- Folders can now be customized with a PerApp profile
- Fixed wrong opacity when opening or closing an app while icon alpha was not 100%
- The scale and rotation will now be correct when opening an app
- Fixed an issue where the icon image would disappear when installing or updating apps
- Fixed an issue that might have cause a crash when rotating the device
- Fixed an issue where the selected icon or background for the preview would not be saved
- Fixed a small animation preview bug in the preferences
- Fixed compatibility issues with Auxo Legacy
- Fixed a crash that could occur when the folder background or mini icons in folders were removed
- Fixed icon label not reverting to default on folders when disabling the tweak without a respring
- Fixed some small bugs in preferences
